questions.question: What is the distance between two saplings?
questions.learning_objective: Students will understand how to find the distance between two saplings.

questions.question: How many equal parts will the distance between the first and last sapling be divided into?
questions.learning_objective: Students will be able to calculate the distance between the first and last sapling.

questions.question: What is the distance between the first and last sapling?
questions.learning_objective: Students will be able to calculate the distance between the first and last sapling.

questions.question: How can the distance between the first and last sapling be represented?
options: As a sum of equal parts
As a difference of two values
As a product of two values
As a quotient of two values
questions.correct: As a sum of equal parts
questions.learning_objective: Students will learn to represent the distance as a sum of equal parts.

questions.question: Tsewang plants four saplings in a row in his garden. The distance between two saplings is m. Find the distance between the first and last sapling.
questions.learning_objective: Students will learn to represent the distance as a sum of equal parts.
